listing.name: Boardroom
listing.description: Our impressive board room has panaromic views of the LBJ corridor and will accommodate 24 people. Beautifully decorated with a drop down privacy screen, a drop down projection screen, and a hide-away attached kitchen facility to serve any catered lunch. It has access to phone and WiFi Internet connection. A wall of windows overlooks the lobby area.

listing.name: Conference Room #1
listing.description: Located right off the lobby, our beautifully furnished interior space with wall of windows looks out to lobby area. Accommodates 10 people with access to phone and WiFi Internet connection. Equipped with writing board.

listing.name: Conference Room #2
listing.description: Our beautifully decorated small conference room is an interior space right off the lobby and will accommodate eight people with access to phone and WiFi Internet connection. Equipped with white board.

listing.name: Day Office
listing.description: Our spacious Day Office is furnished with a desk, credenza, executive chair and two visitor chairs. Professionally decorated, it is located conveniently next to the mail/copy area. Access to phone and WiFi Internet connection.
